title: lava cake
directions: spray ramikins or 6 muffin cups with cooking spray and dust with cocoa
pour butter in heat-proof bowl and place chocolate on top
microwave on high in 10 second increments stirring after each until completely smooth
whisk the flour, sugar, and salt in a small bowl
whisk the eggs and yolks together in another small bowl
pour both bowls into bowl with chocolate and slowly stir together with a spatula until smooth and slightly thick
spoon choocolate into prepared ramekin or muffin cup
bake 12-14 minutes in remekins or 8-10 minutes in muffin cups
allow to cool for 1 minute, then cover with an inverted plate and turn over
